welcome.subtitle: Welcome to Canary Detect
welcome.title: Professional Leak Detection Services in Lanzarote
welcome.paragraph1: Canary Detect provides professional leak detection services across Lanzarote. Our team of experts uses the latest technology and equipment to locate leaks quickly and accurately, helping you save time, money and prevent further damage to your property.
welcome.paragraph2: Whether you have a swimming pool leak, water pipe leak or need underground pipe detection, we have the expertise and equipment to find the problem and provide effective solutions.
welcome.ctaTechnology: See Our Technology & The Canary Detect Difference

technology.sectionDescription: We combine multiple detection technologies to ensure accuracy. Each leak is confirmed using at least two independent methods.
technology.equipmentDescription: Our technicians carry the latest professional-grade equipment to every job.

tracerGas.name: Tracer Gas Detection
tracerGas.subtitle: GASENSE Technology
tracerGas.description: We pressurise pipes with a safe nitrogen/hydrogen mixture. The gas escapes at the leak point and rises through any material - concrete, tiles, soil - where our sensors detect it with pinpoint accuracy.
tracerGas.bestFor: Best for: Underground leaks, concealed pipes, pool pipework

acoustic.name: Acoustic Listening
acoustic.subtitle: Geophones & Correlators
acoustic.description: Detect the sound of water escaping from pressurised pipes. Our equipment amplifies leak sounds thousands of times, allowing us to pinpoint leaks through concrete, soil and other materials.
acoustic.bestFor: Best for: Mains leaks, pressurised systems, large diameter pipes

thermal.name: Thermal Imaging
thermal.subtitle: Infrared Cameras
thermal.description: Identify temperature differences caused by leaking water. Cold water supply leaks or hot water heating leaks show clearly on thermal images, revealing hidden moisture behind walls and under floors.
thermal.bestFor: Best for: Wall leaks, underfloor heating, moisture mapping

pipeMic.name: Internal Microphone
pipeMic.subtitle: Pipe Mics
pipeMic.description: Inserted directly into pipework to listen from inside the pipe. Provides centimetre-precision location of leaks in accessible pipe runs.
pipeMic.bestFor: Best for: Accessible pipes, verification, small diameter pipes

cctv.name: CCTV Inspection
cctv.subtitle: Camera Systems
cctv.description: 6 camera systems for all pipe sizes from 25mm to 300mm. Inspect drains, sewers and underground pipes to find blockages, damage and infiltration.
cctv.bestFor: Best for: Drain surveys, blockages, structural damage

howItWorks.sectionDescription: From your first call to problem solved - here's what to expect.

steps.title: Contact Us
steps.description: Call or fill out our contact form. We'll discuss your situation and provide a fixed-price quote.

steps.title: Assessment
steps.description: We'll assess your property and determine the best detection methods for your specific situation.

steps.title: Detection
steps.description: Our experts use advanced technology to locate your leak with precision, minimising disruption to your property.

steps.title: Report
steps.description: You receive a detailed report documenting our findings, suitable for insurance claims if needed.

steps.title: Repair
steps.description: We can repair the leak or provide guidance for your chosen contractor. Either way, you'll know exactly what needs to be done.

faq.sectionDescription: Got questions about our leak detection services? Here are the answers to the most common questions we receive.
faq.cantFind: Can't find what you're looking for? Contact us and we'll be happy to help.

items.question: What is your 'No Find, No Fee' leak detection policy?
items.answer: If we confirm you have a water leak but cannot locate it, there's no charge for our leak detection service - this has never happened yet. However, if we find that you don't have a leak and your problem is caused by something else, we charge 50% of the inspection cost for a 'Leak Confirmation Survey' and provide a report for your peace of mind.

items.question: How accurate is your water leak detection in Lanzarote?
items.answer: We use a multi-technology approach with over €80,000 in specialist leak detection equipment to confirm every leak location using at least two independent technologies. This provides centimetre precision in 95% of cases, locating water leaks to within 30cm² of their position - keeping repair costs and disruption to an absolute minimum.

items.question: What areas of Lanzarote do you cover for leak detection?
items.answer: We cover the entire island of Lanzarote for water leak detection, pool leak detection and underground pipe detection. This includes Arrecife, Puerto del Carmen, Playa Blanca, Costa Teguise, Tías, Yaiza, Playa Honda, Teguise and all surrounding areas. Our base is in Playa Blanca.

items.question: Do you offer leak repair as well as detection?
items.answer: Yes, we offer complete leak repair services in Lanzarote for water pipe leak repair, pool leak repair and underground leak repair. However, you're also free to use your own contractor for the repair - you're not obliged to use our repair team. We provide detailed reports to guide any repair work.

items.question: Will you need to break walls or floors to find my water leak?
items.answer: Our hidden water leak detection methods are non-invasive. We use acoustic sensors, thermal imaging, tracer gas, CCTV cameras and other advanced technology to locate leaks without damaging your property. In rare cases, minimal access may be needed, but this is discussed and agreed beforehand.

items.question: What leak detection technology do you use?
items.answer: We carry the latest leak detection equipment including: GASENSE tracer gas detection, acoustic geophones for underground water leak detection, infrared thermal imaging cameras for hidden water leak detection, pipe microphones with centimetre precision, and multiple CCTV camera systems for pipes of all sizes.

items.question: Do you provide leak detection reports for insurance claims?
items.answer: Yes, every leak detection inspection includes a detailed professional report that can be used for your insurance company. This documents our findings, methods used and recommendations for leak repair.

items.question: How much does leak detection cost in Lanzarote?
items.answer: We operate on fixed-fee rates with transparent leak detection pricing in Lanzarote. We quote a fixed price upfront and stick to it, regardless of how long the inspection takes. Contact us for a free quote based on your specific requirements.

items.question: My water meter is running - do I have a leak?
items.answer: A constantly running water meter often indicates a hidden water leak. Our FREE leak confirmation test can determine whether you have a leak before committing to a full inspection. We'll assess your water system, check the basics and provide a professional report at no cost.

problemFaq.sectionDescription: Not sure if you have a leak? These are the most common signs our customers notice before calling us. If any of these sound familiar, we can help.

items.question: Why is my pool losing water?
items.answer: If your swimming pool is losing more than 6mm of water per day (beyond normal evaporation), you likely have a leak. Common causes include cracks in the pool shell, damaged pipe connections or faulty fittings. Our pool leak detection service in Lanzarote can pinpoint the exact location using pressure testing and specialist equipment.

items.question: My water meter is running when all taps are off - do I have a leak?
items.answer: Yes, if your water meter continues running when no water is being used, this indicates a hidden water leak somewhere on your property. This could be in underground pipes, under floor slabs or behind walls. Our acoustic and thermal imaging leak detection can find these hidden leaks without breaking walls or floors.

items.question: How do you find water leaks underground?
items.answer: We use multiple technologies to find underground water leaks: tracer gas detection (GASENSE), acoustic listening devices (geophones) and thermal imaging. By combining at least two methods, we achieve centimetre precision in locating underground leaks, minimising excavation and repair costs.

items.question: Can you detect leaks in pool pipes?
items.answer: Yes, we specialise in pool pipe leak detection. We use pressure testing to isolate leaks in pool plumbing, then pinpoint the exact location using acoustic equipment and tracer gas. This works for underground pool pipes, return lines and suction lines.

items.question: Do you repair leaks or just detect them?
items.answer: We offer both leak detection and leak repair services across Lanzarote. Once we locate your leak, we can repair it ourselves or provide detailed guidance for your chosen contractor. Our reports include the exact location and recommended repair methods.

items.question: How much does leak detection cost in Lanzarote?
items.answer: We offer fixed-fee leak detection inspections with no hidden costs. Prices vary based on property size and complexity. Contact us for a free quote. Remember our No Find, No Fee guarantee - if we confirm you have a leak but can't locate it, there's no charge.

about.heroDescription: Lanzarote's trusted leak detection specialists with 40+ years combined experience.
about.storyP1: Canary Detect was founded with a simple mission: to provide Lanzarote with professional, accurate leak detection services using the latest technology.
about.storyP2: After years of experience in the UK water industry, our founders saw a need for specialist leak detection services in the Canary Islands. Too many property owners were suffering from undetected leaks, leading to high water bills, property damage and costly repairs.
about.storyP3: Today, we're proud to be Lanzarote's leading leak detection company, serving homes, businesses, hotels and pool owners across the island.
